ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Unrest Soup
ygData.msgSnippet: The only thing I ve found that really helps at all in Unrest is fighting in 3rd person view and backing the camera off from you a good distance.  Doing this I
ygData.messageBody:
The only thing I've found that really helps at all in Unrest is fighting in
3rd person view and backing the camera off from you a good distance. Doing
this I can twist 4 songs easily, the minute I go to 1st person again,
though, I'm back in soup.

Good luck! I hate Unrest
----- Original Message -----
From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 31, 2000 10:53 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Unrest Soup


> From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>
> I have a P2 266, Vodoo 3, 56k dialup connection, even so most all zones in
> Norrath I have been in are extremely are playable. EXCEPT UNREST. I have
> tried turning off the sky and particle density to no avail. I have talked
to
> others with the same problem. Besides getting a GeForce or an Athelon 800
> (neither in the cards right now) is there any secret setting that will
make
> it so that at least my cursor doesn't slow to a crawl? Or make it possible
> to weave, say, *2* songs?
>
>
> Tszaaz E'Taurguin
>
> P.S. I tried saying "Would someone please bring a Greater Dark Bone to
zone?
> Preferably with fewer than 20hp and make sure he has no friends. Paying
> Faction increase with "WorstDressedBardsOfNorrath" but for some reason I
got
> no takers.
>
>
>
